heading: Wednesday Night
text: Showers likley early, maybe mixing with snow late in the far north.

heading: Thursday
text: Chance of a rain or snow shower north, except snow showers likely in the St. Lawrence Valley. Blustery.

heading: Friday
text: Blustery. Snow showers likely north, scattered south.
temperature: Upper 20s to upper 30s, north to south

heading: Saturday
text: Scattered snow showers in the northeastern mountains, diminishing.
temperature: Low to mid 30s south, mid 20s to lower 30s north
